chooseRightService: Choose the Right Service, from the Right Provider!
loginToYourAccount: Login to your account in Belda Provider App
passwordInvalid: Password must be at least 8 characters and include letters and numbers
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
passwordMustContainUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
passwordMustContainLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
passwordMustContainNumber: Password must contain at least one number
passwordMustContainSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back! You have successfully logged in.
loginErrorDescription: An error occurred while trying to log in. Please try again.
somethingWentWrongPleaseTryAgain: Something went wrong please try again
poorConnectionCheckTheQualityOfTheIntern: Poor connection check the quality of the internet
logoutDescription: You have been logged out successfully.
logoutErrorDescription: There was an issue logging out. Please try again later.
errorMessage: An error occurred, please try again later.
errorDescription: There was an issue with the request. Please check your connection or try again.
invalidOtpDescription: Please double-check the OTP and try again.
changePasswordSuccessDescription: Your password has been updated. Please log in using your new password.
changePasswordErrorDescription: An error occurred while changing your password. Please try again.

addPaymentErrorDescription: An error occurred while processing the payment. Please try again.
updateBookingStatusSuccessDescription: The booking status has been updated to

validationErrorAddTime: Please add a time to {dayName} or turn it off.
validationErrorDayTurnedOn: The day {dayName} is turned on but has no time.

validationDateRangeEmpty: Please select a valid date range.

validationHolidayNameTooLong: Holiday name must not exceed 20 characters.

deleteHolidayToAddNew: Please delete a holiday to add a new one.

domainMessage: You must contact your affiliated company to obtain this domain.
